name: Total Jet Down
description:
Fall through the experimental time cycle whilst avoiding time cracks to make it to the end of time.


A game created for the Three Button Jam, held by 8 Bit to Infinity
(8th of July 2022 - 18th of July 2022)


Controls:
A/D or Left/Right - Boost Left/Right
W, Up or Space - Jetpack Boost

Project created in UE4 by:
Cody Bowyer - Visuals and Sound Implementation
Dav Cummings - Designer and Developer


Audio credits:
